page.title: 19POLEGATE SCHOOL/CLASS SURVEY
page.content: WE CONDUCTED A SURVEY OF THE 37 CHILDREN IN OUR CLASS TO FIND SOME AVERAGE BODY MEASUREMENTS. {AVERAGE VALUES FOR THE CLASS} {age} :10 years 6 months {height} :1 m 48 cm {sitting height} :71.1 cm {body weight} :35 Kg {hand area} :93 sq cm {hand span} :18.6 cm {hand volume} :183.8 ml {foot area} :107.3 sq cm {head circumference} :54.5 cm {resting pulse rate} :73 beats/min{ {exercise pulse rate}:126 beats/min {resting breath rate}:19.8 breaths/min {exercise breath rte}:67 breaths/min _____________________ {50 metres sprint} :8.7 secs {ball bouncing} :141 bounces/min {long jump} :3 metres 28 cm {skipping} :48 skips/min
